item.author: NRC/NMSS/DDUWP/RDB

item.title: PNO-V-93-015:on 930811,4.7 magnitude earthquake occurred.No damage reported at listed facilities.Aerotest reactor was operating & earthquake SCRAM not triggered.Concludes that since no motion detected,MMI probably less than I.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: PNO-V-90-017A:on 900406,three earthquakes felt in Walnut Creek area.Earthquakes not felt at GE facility & NTR reactor not operating at time of earthquake.No damage resulted.

item.title: Generic ltr to all research & test reactor licensees re current status of revised guidance criteria for research & test reactor emergency planning.FR notice published 811231, amends dates & associated power levels for emergency plans.

item.title: PNO-V-90-019:on 900417,earthquakes measuring 4.6 on Richter Scale measured 3 miles west of Upland,CA.On 900418,three earthquakes occurred in northern California.No visual damage occurred to reactors in area.
